alert.note: Alert for Trinity; Walker (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued December 21 at 5:55AM CST until December 21 at 8:00AM CST by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM CST THIS MORNING... ...HARD FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Dense Fog Advisory, visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. For the Hard Freeze Watch, prolonged subfreezing temperatures are expected. Temperatures will remain below freezing for up to 36 to 46 hours with overnight lows below 15 across these counties during that time period. * WHERE...Trinity and Walker Counties. * WHEN...For the Dense Fog Advisory, until 8 AM CST this morning. For the Hard Freeze Watch, from Thursday afternoon through Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing. Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing. If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
